<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Adepts have unlocked only the most minor of occult mysteries. A few are chosen by accomplished practitioners for further training.

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 96

**Perception** +4

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35) +5, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +3, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44) +5, [Scribing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +5, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Con** +0

**Int** +3

**Cha** +1

journal, robes, [scroll case](/Equipment.aspx?ID=640), [Writing Set](/Equipment.aspx?ID=63)

</column>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 8

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
journal +6 ([Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning

**Occult Spells Known** DC 15
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Telekinetic Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=1715)

**Focused Thinker** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The adept concentrates to muster knowledge and wisdom. While focusing, they gain a +2 status bonus to checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367), but take a –2 penalty to Perception. They can Dismiss this focused state.

</column>
